chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: CompleteSpace

Goal:
forall F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim F) eps)

Premises:
Record ProperFilter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter { filter_ex : forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x; filter_filter : Filter F } For ProperFilter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope _]
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
cauchy = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists x : T, F (ball x eps) : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
ball = fun M : UniformSpace => UniformSpace.ball M (UniformSpace.class M) : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> R -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ R_scope _]
lim = CompleteSpace.lim (UniformSpace.Pack T (CompleteSpace.class T) T) (CompleteSpace.class T) : ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T Argument scope is [function_scope]
ClassicalFacts.F : forall A : Prop, ClassicalFacts.has_fixpoint A -> (A -> A) -> A
CompleteSpace.ax1 : forall (T : UniformSpace) (m : CompleteSpace.mixin_of T) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (CompleteSpace.lim T m F) eps)
CompleteSpace.Mixin : forall (T : UniformSpace) (lim : ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T), (forall F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim F) eps)) -> (forall F1 F2 : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (lim F1) (lim F2)) -> CompleteSpace.mixin_of T
Record mixin_of (T : UniformSpace) : Type := Mixin { lim : ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T; ax1 : forall F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim F) eps); ax2 : forall F1 F2 : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (lim F1) (lim F2) } For Mixin: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
Proper_StrongProper : forall F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter' F where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type]
filtermap_proper_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter (filtermap f F)
filter_filter = fun (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (ProperFilter0 : ProperFilter F) => let (_, filter_filter) := ProperFilter0 in filter_filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> Filter F Arguments T, F, ProperFilter are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
Build_ProperFilter' : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ~ F (fun _ : T => False) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter' F
filtermapi_proper_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun x : T => (exists y : U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter (filtermapi f F)
filter_prod_filter : forall (T U : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> Filter G -> Filter (filter_prod F G)
filtermap_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> Filter (filtermap f F)
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
filtermapi_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun x : T => (exists y : U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> Filter F -> Filter (filtermapi f F)
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
is_filter_lim = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (x : T) => forall P : T -> Prop, locally x P -> F P : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Inductive filter_prod (T U : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : T * U -> Prop) : Prop := Filter_prod : forall (Q : T -> Prop) (R : U -> Prop), F Q -> G R -> (forall (x : T) (y : U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F G P For filter_prod: Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted For Filter_prod: Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted For filter_prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope] For Filter_prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope _ _ function_scope]
Record ProperFilter' (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter' { filter_not_empty : ~ F (fun _ : T => False); filter_filter' : Filter F } For ProperFilter': Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter': Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter': Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ _]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
filterlimi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermapi f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_prod_proper = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (F : (T1 -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (T2 -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (FG : ProperFilter G) => {| filter_ex := fun (P : T1 * T2 -> Prop) (H : filter_prod F G P) => match H with | @Filter_prod _ _ _ _ _ Q1 Q2 H1 H2 HP => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (x : T1) (p : (fun x0 : T1 => Q1 x0) x), (fun _ : exists x0 : T1, Q1 x0 => exists x0 : T1 * T2, P x0) (ex_intro (fun x0 : T1 => Q1 x0) x p) => match filter_ex Q1 H1 as e return ((fun _ : exists x : T1, Q1 x => exists x : T1 *...
close = fun (M : UniformSpace) (x y : M) => forall eps : posreal, ball x eps y : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted
locally_not' : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> ~ P y} where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace]
fct_ball : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace), (T -> U) -> R -> (T -> U) -> Prop
filterlimi_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop) (y : ?U), filterlimi f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => exists z : ?U, f x z /\ ball y eps z)) where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace] ?F : [T : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
locally_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace]
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
CompleteSpace.lim : forall T : UniformSpace, CompleteSpace.mixin_of T -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T
